name: Cheesy Pull Apart Pizza Bread
description: Cheesy Pull Apart Pizza Bread. Pizza Monkey bread. Add roasted veggies, olives, mushrooms to make into a pizza bake. Vegan Soy-free Recipe.

video.name: PULL APART PIZZA BREAD ROLLS | Vegan Richa Recipes
video.description:
Cheesy Pull Apart Pizza Bread Rolls! GF option
ðŸ’™ðŸ§¡FULL RECIPE: https://www.veganricha.com/2017/07/cheesy-pull-apart-pizza-bread.html
ðŸ’™ðŸ§¡MY COOKBOOKS: https://veganricha.com/mybooks

These Pizza Rolls are super easy and a great snack for everyone at the party. I use my 20 minute pizza dough, divide and roll it into mini dinner roll size balls. Place them in a pie pan, then drizzle a mozzarella style cashew cream from my Pizza Dip Recipe (which you must try! it is GF). Some more pizza sauce, more of the mozzarella cream, basil and peppers and bake!

The cashew mozzarella cream thickens during baking. Use more cashews for thicker cream. The result is rolls coated in thick creamy cheese sauce, pizza sauce and other toppings(add some mushrooms, olives, peppers before the second cream drizzle). For gluten-free option, use my gluten-free dinner rolls or make the pizza dip. 
GF Pizza Dip: https://www.veganricha.com/2017/01/vegan-pizza-dip.html

https://soundcloud.com/lakeyinspired/

recipeIngredient: 2  + cups flour (I use 1/2 cup wheat flour and 1 1/2 cups unbleached white)
3 tbsp semolina flour or use wheat flour
1/3 cup cashews ((use a heaping up for creamier) soaked for 15 minutes in warm water then drained.)
1/2 tsp white miso (or use chickpea miso to make soyfree)

itemListElement.text: Proof the yeast by mixing yeast, warm water and sugar and letting it sit for 5 minutes. Then mix in the flours, salt,herbs, 2 tsp oil until a sticky dough. Add flour 1 tbsp at a time if needed until it is slightly sticky. Let dough rest for 10-15 minutes near the warming oven. Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F.
itemListElement.name: Proof the yeast by mixing yeast, warm water and sugar and letting it sit for 5 minutes. Then mix in the flours, salt,herbs, 2 tsp oil until a sticky dough. Add flour 1 tbsp at a time if needed until it is slightly sticky. Let dough rest for 10-15 minutes near the warming oven. Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F.

itemListElement.text: Blend everything under cashew mozzarella cream until smooth. Blend for a minute then let it rest for a minute and then blend again, repeat until very smooth. Taste and adjust salt and flavor.
itemListElement.name: Blend everything under cashew mozzarella cream until smooth. Blend for a minute then let it rest for a minute and then blend again, repeat until very smooth. Taste and adjust salt and flavor.

itemListElement.text: Drizzle oil on the dough and spread. Divide the dough into 12 to 14 portions and shape into small balls. Place in a deep 9 inch pie dish or a 9 by 9 inch baking dish, atleast a 1/2 inch apart. Keep more space between the balls in the middle as the middle gets less heat and the crowding might cause the dough to not cook through. If all of the balls dont fit, freeze the rest wrapped in plastic wrap, to bake into dinner rolls later.
itemListElement.name: Drizzle oil on the dough and spread. Divide the dough into 12 to 14 portions and shape into small balls. Place in a deep 9 inch pie dish or a 9 by 9 inch baking dish, atleast a 1/2 inch apart. Keep more space between the balls in the middle as the middle gets less heat and the crowding might cause the dough to not cook through. If all of the balls dont fit, freeze the rest wrapped in plastic wrap, to bake into dinner rolls later.

itemListElement.text: Let the balls sit in a warm place for 5 minutes. Pour just a little of the cashew cream in between the rolls. Spread tomato/pizza sauce on top of the buns. Sprinkle oregano.
itemListElement.name: Let the balls sit in a warm place for 5 minutes. Pour just a little of the cashew cream in between the rolls. Spread tomato/pizza sauce on top of the buns. Sprinkle oregano.

itemListElement.text: Bake for 15 mins. Remove from the oven.
itemListElement.name: Bake for 15 mins. Remove from the oven.

itemListElement.text: Add roasted veggies if using between the rolls now. Pour more of the cashew cream over the buns, and more between the rolls that on the top. Reserve some of the cashew cream to add later. Add 1 tbsp chopped basil and sliced jalapeno or olives on top.
itemListElement.name: Add roasted veggies if using between the rolls now. Pour more of the cashew cream over the buns, and more between the rolls that on the top. Reserve some of the cashew cream to add later. Add 1 tbsp chopped basil and sliced jalapeno or olives on top.

itemListElement.text: Bake for another 15 to 20 minutes. Take rolls out of the oven and rest for 2 minutes.
itemListElement.name: Bake for another 15 to 20 minutes. Take rolls out of the oven and rest for 2 minutes.

itemListElement.text: Meanwhile, if there is enough cashew cream leftover, heat it in a pan over medium low heat until thickened. Stir frequently to avoid lumps. then drop dollops over the rolls. Or if there is just a bit left, drizzle the cashew cream directly over the hot rolls.
itemListElement.name: Meanwhile, if there is enough cashew cream leftover, heat it in a pan over medium low heat until thickened. Stir frequently to avoid lumps. then drop dollops over the rolls. Or if there is just a bit left, drizzle the cashew cream directly over the hot rolls.

itemListElement.text: Sprinkle fresh basil, pepper flakes and a tsp of extra virgin olive oil. Serve hot.
itemListElement.name: Sprinkle fresh basil, pepper flakes and a tsp of extra virgin olive oil. Serve hot.
